Description:When the enemy you exceed the number ... honestly will only beat the dead.
In battle, there is no honor and courage. There are only winners and losers - the living and the dead. Detachment of "Ghosts" not worried numerical superiority. They are doing everything possible to crush and destroy the enemy. Technologies of the future - is the key to excellence in an unequal battle. Become part of an elite squad perfectly trained special forces ruthless in Ghost Recon Future Soldier. Armed to the teeth with unrivaled cutting-edge technology, a team of Ghost Recon will go along with you in the danger zone around the globe to track down and destroy the most priorities.Additions:Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon: Future Soldier Ã¢â€žÂ¢ Digital Deluxe Edition includes the following additions to the game:
FOUR originality WEAPONS:

AK-47 - available for shturmovika- "Werewolf".
Mk 14 - available for shturmovika- "Ghost."
Sniper rifle M40A5 - available for razvedchika- "Ghost."
Sniper Rifle MN 91/30 - available for razvedchika- "Werewolf".

48 species SETTINGS FOR HAT:

You will get more opportunities to customize your character and you can make it truly unique on the battlefield.

Two additional camouflage for WEAPONS:

Tiger camouflage
Winter camouflage

TWO EXCLUSIVE MAPS:

Drilling ship: Exclusive card for passing a joint, where you have to play in the harsh Arctic cold on a huge drilling ship!
Moscow suburbs: This exclusive card for multiple players will immerse you into the heart of the city hot battle.
Deluxe Edition pre-order and get four additional camouflage for weapons: English, Romanian, forest and snake camouflage.
